Christ Church Bayston Hill 2O'Clock service for Good Friday Leading the service is Rev Peter Hubbard and Debbie Hubbard
The Reading are: First reading: Luke 22:47-62 read by Richard Lansdale Second reading: Matthew 26: 57-68 read by Libby Wain Third reading: John 19:1-16 read by Tim Ryan Gospel reading Mark 15:33-41 read by Eleanor Aldred
There will be pauses and the screen will go black for parts of the service - this is intended as part of the reflection process
Songs: When I survey the Wondrous Cross Faithful One Jesus, Remember Me There is a green hill far away
